quotes: Live simply, love generously, care deeply, speak kindly, leave the rest to God.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: The future doesn’t belong to the light-hearted. It belongs to the brave.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Heroes may not be braver than anyone else. They’re just braver 5 minutes longer.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: When you can’t make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: America is too great for small dreams.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Surround yourself with great people; delegate authority; get out of the way.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Mr. Gorbachev, tear down this wall!
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Freedom is never more than one generation away from extinction.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Government’s first duty is to protect the people, not run their lives
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: If we lose freedom here, there is no place to escape to. This is the last stand on earth.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Just think how happy you’d be if you lost everything you have right now & then got it back.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: We fought a war on poverty, and poverty won
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: I am not going to exploit for political purposes my opponent’s youth and inexperience.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: As I have often said, governments don’t produce economic growth, people do.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: A tree’s a tree. How many more do you need to look at?
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: America will never be whole as long as the right to life granted by our Creator is denied to the unborn.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: I do believe that an AK-47, a machine gun, is not a sporting weapon or needed for defense of a home.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Radio was theater of the mind.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Tax increases don’t eliminate deficits they increase govt. spending.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Recession is when your neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours. And recovery is when Jimmy Carter loses his.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: A nation that cannot control its borders is not a nation.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Republicans believe every day is the Fourth of July, but the democrats believe every day is April 15.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: America was founded by people who believe that God was their rock of safety.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: It's true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: I did turn 75 today - but remember, that's only 24 Celsius.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Please tell me you're all Republicans.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Honey, I forgot to duck.
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Government does not solve problems; it subsidizes them
author: Ronald Reagan

quotes: Government always finds a need for whatever money it gets.

quotes: I've noticed that everybody that is for abortion has already been born.
author: Ronald Reagan
